name: Moroccan-Style Carrot Salad
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: carrot, rose water, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 5 large carrots, peeled and coarsely grated (3 1/2 to 4 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the coriander and cumin in a dry pan over medium-high heat, shaking often to avoid burning, until just fragrant and slightly darker, about 3 minutes.
Combine spices with remaining ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Refrigerate, covered, for one hour or up to 24 hours. Stir before serving.
